solution_line_template: The council planted twice their goal so there is a total of {original_planned_trees} planned cherry trees * {multiplier_twice} = <<{original_planned_trees}*{multiplier_twice}={total_cherry_trees}>>{total_cherry_trees} cherry trees.
So there must be {total_cherry_trees} cherry trees * {leaves_per_tree} leaves falling from each tree = <<{total_cherry_trees}*{leaves_per_tree}={total_leaves}>>{total_leaves} leaves.
